ResearchProjectDef.label: hack Ultratech database
ResearchProjectDef.description: Using your multi-analyzer and long range comms equipment, attempt to gain access to the Ultratech faction's database.
ResearchProjectDef.discoveredLetterText:
The hacking was very successful!
Although the connection was shut down almost as soon as it was opened, you still managed to steal enough blueprints and information to start researching and building antimatter technology.

You are concerned that you data heist has angered the Ultratech faction, but you consider the power that this technology will give you worth the risk.
